Package de.ukbonn.mwtek.dashboard.controller

Class DataRetrievalController

java.lang.Object
de.ukbonn.mwtek.dashboard.controller.DataRetrievalController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/createJson") public class DataRetrievalController extends Object
Controller class for the "/createJson" REST endpoint with the main method to create the Json specification for the Corona Dashboard.

  • Method Details

    • createJson

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createJson(@RequestParam(required=false) List<String> scopes)
      REST endpoint (/createJson) that handles FHIR server data retrieval as well as processing in Ukb resources, calling dashboard logic and providing Json output.
      Returns:
      String with the json corona dashboard specification or alternatively an error message

    • isScopeActivatedViaParameters

      public static boolean isScopeActivatedViaParameters(List<String> scopes, DataItemContext dataItemContext)
      Checks if a specific scope is activated via parameters, given a list of scopes and a data item context.
      Parameters:
      scopes - a list of scope names, which may include mixed case strings
      dataItemContext - the context of the data item to check for activation
      Returns:
      true if the specified data item context is activated by one of the scopes; false otherwise
